typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01sales
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src02currency
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src03currencyrate
src01sales select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID = Column_1,
		RevisionNumber = Column_2,
		OrderDate = Column_3,
		DueDate = Column_4,
		ShipDate = Column_5,
		Status = Column_6,
		OnlineOrderFlag = Column_7,
		SalesOrderNumber = Column_8,
		PurchaseOrderNumber = Column_9,
		AccountNumber = Column_10,
		CustomerID = Column_11,
		SalesPersonID = Column_12,
		TerritoryID = Column_13,
		BillToAddressID = Column_14,
		ShipToAddressID = Column_15,
		ShipMethodID = Column_16,
		CreditCardID = Column_17,
		CreditCardApprovalCode = Column_18,
		CurrencyRateID = Column_19,
		SubTotal = Column_20,
		TaxAmt = Column_21,
		Freight = Column_22,
		TotalDue = Column_23,
		Comment = Column_24,
		rowguid = Column_25,
		ModifiedDate = Column_26
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(SalesOrderID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		RevisionNumber = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		OrderDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		DueDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ShipDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		Status = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		OnlineOrderFlag = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		SalesOrderNumber = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		PurchaseOrderNumber = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		AccountNumber = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CustomerID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		SalesPersonID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TerritoryID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		BillToAddressID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ShipToAddressID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ShipMethodID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CreditCardID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CreditCardApprovalCode = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		CurrencyRateID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		SubTotal = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TaxAmt = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		Freight = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		TotalDue = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		Comment = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		rowguid = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ModifiedDate = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
src02currency select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
src03currencyrate select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive() ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
